amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 6105 from the bill which provides the authorization for the Rural Broadband Access Loan and Loan Guarantee Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 34 printed in part B of House Report 113-117 to strike section 6105 from the bill which provides the authorization for the Rural Broadband Access Loan and Loan Guarantee Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gingrey (GA) amendment (A031) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gingrey (GA) amendment (A031) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A031) offered by Mr. Gingrey (GA).
